text: Madasphecia griveaudi is a moth of the family Sesiidae. It is found in south- western Madagascar. It is only known from its male holotype that was caught at the Mahafaly Plateau.Bartsch D., 2009. Melittosesia, a new genus of clearwing moths with a review of the Sesiini Boisduval, 1828 in Madagascar (Lep.:Sesiidae). - Entomologische Zeitschrift 119 (1): 9-12, 3 pl. ==References== Category:Sesiidae Category:Moths described in 1982 Category:Moths of Madagascar Category:Moths of Africa
title: Madasphecia griveaudi
